title: Depth Map Data
description: Generates depth graphic from a 2D scene. This contains a bitmap for a grayscale graphic which represents depth with the same dimensions as the original image and a scaling factor to convert depth to real-world distance

depth-map.description: 2D representation of Depth. Single channel float32 bitmap with the same dimensions as the original image. Low values are closer to the camera while larger values are further away.

scaling.description: Max distance to meter conversion, 0 for no scaling. Without scaling, all distances are relative, once a scalling value is set the maximum distance will take on its value and all other distances will be modified to scale from 'scaling value' to 0
